name: Wormzilla
description:
Wormy is held prisoner in a mad scientist's lab. Can you help him escape through 6 levels?

Left/Right arrows to move.
Space or Up arrow to jump.

Evolve legs to jump.
Evolve arms to pull levers.
But be careful, if you grow legs you're taller and can't go through tiles with a low ceiling.
If you push every button and pull the lever, the door will open!

(Didn't have time to finish the worm's sprites, so when you evolve arms and legs you won't see them on the character, but you still get the abilities)

Made for Godot Wild Jam.
